title: The Rose Revived
description: May, Sally and Harriet have had enough.They may work at Quality Cleaners, but there is nothing quality about the way their boss, ‘Slimeball’ Slater runs the business.Sick and tired of working for a crook, May, Sally and Harriet decide to set up their own business. Soon May finds she can afford the mooring fees for her beloved narrowboat, Harriet discovers she has a gift for painting, and Sally’s dream of owning a place of her own is fast becoming a reality. It all seems to be going so well. But is it really?And is it too much, May wonders, to want a man to share her new found happiness?
author: Katie Fforde
